Attributes.description: Self-directed, collaborative studies, in a group-learning environment, initiated and coordinated by senior undergraduate students with the supervision of a faculty advisor. Course structure, enrolment and delivery methods will comply with the Handbook for Student Directed Seminars.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (Third-year standing in the Faculty of Science.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 12:30, End Time: 14:00
